official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide medicaid coverage with respect to certain dependent children and relatives without regard to certain work disincentives imposed by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.

summary.text: Medicaid Work Incentive Amendments of 1981 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit a State to permit individuals to have income above the amounts set in the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981 and still qualify as AFDC (Aid to Families with Dependent Children, title IV) recipients for purposes of title XIX.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide medicaid coverage with respect to certain dependent children and relatives without regard to certain work disincentives imposed by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.
